intro.name: HI! I AM SUVRAT MITTAL
intro.introText: I am a B.Tech student in 2nd Year
intro.bgImage: White Minimal Typographic Quote Facebook Video.gif

about.heading: ABOUT ME
about.content:
I'm a 20-year-old BTech student with a strong passion for Data Structures, Algorithms, and Web Development. My curiosity drives me to explore the digital world and solve complex problems with creative solutions.

Technology has always fascinated me, fueling my journey to learn and build meaningful products. I've developed a solid foundation in DSA and web development, always eager to grow.

I thrive on collaboration and aim to create innovative solutions that tackle real-world challenges. I'm ready to bring my skills and enthusiasm to a dynamic team.

Let's create something extraordinary together.

projects.description: Inputs numeric verification code entered by the user in a smooth manner

Shows testimonials by fetching APIs and making a timer.

A silly little game using the blend HTML, CSS, & JS
A little and fun Quiz with hard coded questions and using javascript
Made a notes app using Local storage of browser and javascript
